column4: I'm on 10.04. Can I pull packages fro ma 12.04 repository? Namely GedDeb from UbuntuUpdates
you do NOT want to cross release repos. Will break your system.
good to know. thanks. Will Ubuntu refuse to pull from there? Because  I tried with no success.
(not that I'll insist. I'm wondering if it was a protective measure or if I added the repo incorrectly)
